feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:05 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 02:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
